product_name: Smith Parallel Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The lightweight, versatile Smith Parallel polarized interchangeable sunglasses include a selection of lenses for any light and offer great peripheral vision when running, cycling or paddling. Polarized gold mirror lenses (brown tint) are made for bright days with a 14% Visible Light Transmission (VLT). Frames include 2 additional sets of lenses: Ignitor (red-tinted) for optimal depth perception in medium light/overcast conditions (32% VLT) and clear for dim light (98% VLT). Frames are made from a bio-plastic derived from non-GMO castor seeds and lightweight nylon for a resilient, consistent fit. Scratch- and impact-resistant polycarbonate lenses use Smith Tapered Lens Technology(TM); the lens is progressively tapered so that light travels through without distortion. Hydrophilic Megol(TM) nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Smith Parallel polarized interchangeable sunglasses have a medium fit with medium lenses.
short_description: The lightweight, versatile Smith Parallel polarized interchangeable sunglasses include a selection of lenses for any light and offer great peripheral vision when running, cycling or paddling.
